Texts.Chs:
Zoroark are bipedal fox-like beings that use illusions to fool their prey or predators, to hide their territory, or to protect their young. Like a handful of other races, they too escaped the destruction of Earth. However, it is unclear whether the remaining Pokemon or their trainers escaped the destruction.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% 速度, +^green;10^reset;% 跳跃
  伤害 x^green;1.1^reset;,  能量x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;25^reset;% Shadow, +^green;10^reset;% Cosmic
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;: Jungle, Mud

^orange;环境^reset;:
  Damage and Physical resistance lowered during the day, and heightened during the night
  Midnight, Lightless, Penumbra:  能量x^green;1.15^reset;, HPx^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;:
  Broadsword/Shortsword/Spear/Shortspear/Scythe/Rapier/Dagger: 伤害 x^green;1.05^reset;
  Energy Weapons: 伤害 x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% 暴击几率

^red;弱点^reset;:
  Defense x^red;0.8^reset;, HPx^red;0.95^reset;,
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;45^reset;% Physical
Texts.Eng:
Zoroark are bipedal fox-like beings that use illusions to fool their prey or predators, to hide their territory, or to protect their young. Like a handful of other races, they too escaped the destruction of Earth. However, it is unclear whether the remaining Pokemon or their trainers escaped the destruction.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset;% Speed, +^green;10^reset;% Jump
  Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Energy x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;25^reset;% Shadow, +^green;10^reset;% Cosmic
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Jungle, Mud

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Damage and Physical resistance lowered during the day, and heightened during the night
  Midnight, Lightless, Penumbra: Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, Health x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Broadsword/Shortsword/Spear/Shortspear/Scythe/Rapier/Dagger: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  Energy Weapons: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Defense x^red;0.8^reset;, Health x^red;0.95^reset;,
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;45^reset;% Physical
